import React from 'react' import {Card, Typography, CardContent, Grid} from '@material-ui/core' import styles from './Cards.module.css' function Cards(props) { const {confirmed, recovered, deaths, lastUpdate} = props.data console.log(confirmed) if( isEmpty(props.data)){ return 'Loading....' } return (
Infected {confirmed.value} Real Date Number of active cases of COVID-19 Recovered Real Data Real Date Number of recoveries from COVID-19 Deaths Real Data Real Date Number of deaths caused by COVID-19
) } export default Cards
